combo.name: DMDF.DISTRICT
combo.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT D.CUID, D.LABEL_CN, 'DISTRICT' AS BM_CLASS_ID FROM DISTRICT D, (SELECT CUID FROM DISTRICT WHERE LABEL_CN IN (SELECT PARA_VALUE FROM SYSTEM_PARA WHERE PARA_NAME = 'DISTRICT_ID') UNION SELECT CUID FROM DISTRICT WHERE CUID IN (SELECT PARA_VALUE FROM SYSTEM_PARA WHERE PARA_NAME = 'DISTRICT_ID')) PROVINCE, USER_MANAGE_DISTRICT UM, SYS_USER SU WHERE UM.USER_CUID = SU.CUID AND UM.DISTRICT_CUID = D.CUID AND LENGTH(D.CUID) >= 20 AND SUBSTR(D.CUID, 0, 20) = PROVINCE.CUID AND SU.USER_NAME = '{userId}' AND '{superuser}' != 'true' ORDER BY D.LABEL_CN) UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT D.CUID, D.LABEL_CN, 'DISTRICT' AS BM_CLASS_ID FROM DISTRICT D, (SELECT CUID FROM DISTRICT WHERE LABEL_CN IN (SELECT PARA_VALUE FROM SYSTEM_PARA WHERE PARA_NAME = 'DISTRICT_ID') UNION SELECT CUID FROM DISTRICT WHERE CUID IN (SELECT PARA_VALUE FROM SYSTEM_PARA WHERE PARA_NAME = 'DISTRICT_ID')) PROVINCE WHERE LENGTH(D.CUID) >= 20 AND SUBSTR(D.CUID, 0, 20) = PROVINCE.CUID AND '{superuser}' = 'true' ORDER BY D.LABEL_CN)

combo.name: DMDF.CITY
combo.sql: SELECT D.CUID,D.LABEL_CN,'CITY' AS BM_CLASS_ID FROM DISTRICT D , (SELECT CUID FROM DISTRICT WHERE LABEL_CN IN (SELECT PARA_VALUE FROM SYSTEM_PARA WHERE PARA_NAME = 'DISTRICT_ID') UNION SELECT CUID FROM DISTRICT WHERE CUID IN (SELECT PARA_VALUE FROM SYSTEM_PARA WHERE PARA_NAME = 'DISTRICT_ID')) PROVINCE WHERE LENGTH(D.CUID) = 26 AND SUBSTR(D.CUID, 0, 20) = PROVINCE.CUID ORDER BY D.LABEL_CN

combo.name: DM.PROJECT_PLAN_PERIOD
combo.sql: SELECT D.CUID,D.LABEL_CN,'PROJECT_PLAN_PERIOD' AS BM_CLASS_ID FROM PROJECT_PLAN_PERIOD D

combo.name: DM.VPN
combo.sql: SELECT D.CUID,D.LABEL_CN,'VPN' AS BM_CLASS_ID FROM VPN D

combo.name: DM.VP
combo.sql: SELECT D.CUID,D.LABEL_CN,'VP' AS BM_CLASS_ID FROM VP D

combo.name: DM.ACCESSPOINT
combo.sql: SELECT D.CUID,D.LABEL_CN,'ACCESSPOINT' AS BM_CLASS_ID FROM ACCESSPOINT D

combo.name: DM.FIBER_CAB
combo.sql: SELECT D.CUID,D.LABEL_CN,'FIBER_CAB' AS BM_CLASS_ID FROM FIBER_CAB D

combo.name: DM.ROFH_FULL_ADDRESS
combo.sql: SELECT T.CUID, T.LABEL_CN, 'T_ROFH_FULL_ADDRESS' AS BM_CLASS_ID FROM T_ROFH_FULL_ADDRESS T
